release.action: Removed Swing client application utility classes. Added final modifier to reference implementation classes. Updated to the latest container hooks. Added package org.jdtaus.core.nio.util providing utilities for encoding and decoding bytes for various charsets.

Documentation updates. Updated class Charsets to first lookup charsets by using Charset.forName() falling back to looking up CharsetProvider instances by using the current thread's context classloader before re-throwing the UnsupportedCharsetException thrown by Charset.forName().
Fixed another performance regression introduced in 1.0-beta-3.
Updated class StructuredFileOperations to stop monitoring tasks not moving more than a configurable amount of bytes.
